website_summaries.verdict: A best pick for a natural antifungal soap that is good for a variety of conditions.
pros: Customers like the fact that this soap contains natural ingredients yet is effective on several fungal and bacterial conditions
It stands out for reducing irritation
Refreshing and cooling on the skin
cons: Some felt it was too expensive

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and Works
customer_reviews.text: I think its been over 2 weeks now since I started using this product and I must say I was skeptical but ended up being impressed. After a good 2 weeks of use my bra area (under my ta ta's) no longer has a major itch/irritated area. And I don't find myself having that sour smell like I used to on a hot day in that area. Bathing with this body wash is refreshing and I like the scent which is cool, because I'm very sensitive to scents/smells. I say give it a try, because I think you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tee 619

customer_reviews.title: Bronner's Tea Tree soap in the past with some success but this stuff has tea tree oil PLUS a myriad of other ingredients that knock everything out for good. BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for the second time! I have a major problem with persistent skin rashes due to candidiasis (yeast) and THIS is the only thing that truly gets rid of the rashes. I'm talking full-body rashes. It's GROSS. I've used Dr. Bronner's Tea Tree soap in the past with some success but this stuff has tea tree oil PLUS a myriad of other ingredients that knock everything out for good. BUY IT. You won't regret it. Smells good, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad we tried it
customer_reviews.text: We love this. I initially bought this for my fiancé and his foot fungus issues. But we all used it and love it. I have terrible eczema on my back and this helps a lot. It’s helped clear up my sons back acne and I believe it’s helping cut down on my cystic acne breakouts. My youngest son is at that stinky boy age, and this helps tremendously with odor. I’m so glad we purchased this. It leaves us all feeling clean, smelling fresh, and doesn’t dry us out.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my rash
customer_reviews.text: I have had skin irritations pop up off-and-on my whole life. For several years I dealt with an eczema-like rash and cracking on my hands - I finally found that jojoba oil cured that. Then I had a rash pop up all over my torso. I had not changed diet, laundry detergent or any other environmental factors. I wondered if it might be yeast - the jojoba wasn't working, and nothing else was working either. I tried this (I apply straight with my hands, since I thought my previous use of a loofah might be spreading the rash) and within two weeks it was completely cleared up. I didn't have a formal diagnosis, just a hunch. This stuff paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: I had a recurring fungus problem under my breasts and belly folds and this soap eliminated the problem. It suds easily and rinses off with ease. I tried powders and creams to no avail. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Norris

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about two weeks it get rid of the fungus (athlete's foot) but using this product as a daily basis started to burning my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique M

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a large bodied person and highly recommend this for those who just want to feel more refreshed in between showers. Especially if you’re active or just in those summer months. Works great on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the souths' heat and humidity can leave you a little smelly by the end of the day. This product is fantastic. I use tea tree oil for a lot of home remedies and so this soap is perfect. It smells great, lathers well, leaves no residue and also leaves you feeling fresh and completely clean. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Skunk Smell Be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's feet smell like skunk spray when she sweats. To combat this problem I bought this soap and a foot brush. Every morning my daughter scrubs her feet with this soap on the foot brush. So far, the smell has been completely gone! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap so much that I now subscribe to have it shipped regularly to me. It is nothing short of miraculous. I didn't expect it to work as well as it did. In fact, I have little tiny bumps on the back of my arm that I have had for years. I used this once, didn't use any special scrubber (just a wash cloth) and after I showered I noticed when I put lotion on that my arm was completely smooth!! It is nothing short of miraculous. It leaves skin ultra smooth, smells good, and makes my skin look amazing. I won't buy any other body soap after finding this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in hives every time I attempted to use this Remedy Soap.
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed are all organic or natural so I was really surprised when I broke out in hives right after using the remedy soap. I thought it must be a fluke, so I waited several weeks, then tried again. Hives again! This could not be the soap I thought. So I waited a few weeks and then tried again. More hives! What is in this stuff? I have never experienced this with an all natural organic product until now. I wish I could return it. If you have sensitive skin, be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: A Miracle Worker
customer_reviews.text: I am a female who unfortunately suffers from pretty bad underarm odor. I sweat easily, & when I sweat, it smells. I have tried many things to try to mask/eliminate the smell, but typically to no avail. I have used anti-bacterial soap, but soon started combining that with vinegar - however, I would usually end up smelling like a salad. That’s when I got Remedy Soap. Now I am able to go all day without smelling like sweat. Even going for a walk in the humid heat, my armpits aren’t smelly afterwards. This stuff works & it works well.
customer_reviews.author: brhi

customer_reviews.title: I want to cry I’m so happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My mother was suffering from bad yeast infections so bad I had to keep taking her to the doctors. I started using the body wash for my acne so I suggested to my mom that she try a little bit. OMG it helped her so much that I order the body wash for her and the soap for her. My mother is feeling so much better. It brings tears to my eyes because she doesn’t have to suffer anymore. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Cured my ringworm when OTC Creams wouldn't!
customer_reviews.text: Used to treat a case of ringworm on my chest I contracted in Mexico and it took care of it very quickly. I had been using an OTC ringworm treatment for 2 months, spending over $150 dollars (those $12 dollar tubes add up!) and didn't see any results. After using this product for the first time, there was no itching. 2 weeks later and the rashes cleared up and there is no evidence that I ever had them. I continued using this product till I ran out and the ringworm didn't come back and a month later I still don't have it.
customer_reviews.author: CatLover143

customer_reviews.title: Formulation has changed - terrible quality now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product six months ago and I loved it...I could clearly smell tea tree oil. I purchased another bottle just recently. Much to my disappointment, the quality is no longer the same as it used to be. I believe they have changed the formulation. I smell NO tea tree oil in this bottle...there is only a FAINT peppermint smell. As far as I'm concerned, they are falsely advertising this product as "tea tree oil body wash" now. I am processing my return now. Do not purchase until they change the formulation back to what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: KT-amazon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap.... love, love, love! Leaves skin soft & feeling super clean. Even signed up for auto delivery - it is that important to me! Really cuts down on body odor better than all other fragranced body washes we have tried. Also, we bought some foot "scrubbers" for bathtub "floor".... pour some soap on it, wash feet while showering... total control on fungus! We prob sound like "filthy" family, but we're just regular, active group... & we really endorse this soap! (Probably NOT good for little kids, we don't know)
customer_reviews.author: ScrabbleNut

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten several recommendations for this product from people in a support group I'm in and I could not be happier with it. I was having a heck of a time with skin irritations and this product cleared it up with in a few days. I use it daily as a body wash but I also use it once a week on my hair for dandruff control, and my hair is so bouncy and curly and my scalp seems to be less dry. The smell is very tea tree, but it isn't unpleasant and doesn't linger on the body. I would 10/10 recommend this to a friend of family member.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I got ringworm on my scalp from a salon using a dirty comb!!! Pumped full of meds to “kill it” for the last 5 months and the itching hasnt stopped.. i started looking for my own “natural” remedies. This within 2 days of use has made the ringworm on my face considerably less noticeable. And after day 1 the itching on my scalp has went down. I’m not making this up, nor is it in my head. Ive been dealing with this for 5 months. The smell is to be expected but its not overwhelming, it didnt dry my scalp or face, and it just WORKS. Will continue using. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: Instead of helping and soothing my skin condition--it made it worse. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: thelma C. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't anger my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and often get ingrown hair on my body. I have found that tea-tree oil helps my skin when that happens and I was looking for a soap that contained it so that I wouldn't have to manually add it to an existing liquid soap. I love the tingly feeling that the peppermint oil in this soap provides. I would prefer if it contained a pump, so I used a pump from another soap bottle that I had in the house and screwed it in here and it fit.
customer_reviews.author: SWD

customer_reviews.title: This is one great product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing had helped my wife's itching skin until she started using Remedy Soap in the shower. She said her skin feels so clean and soft and she no longer uses any moisturizing creams after her showers. This is one great product.
customer_reviews.author: David C Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing But Stink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am prone to yeast rash. Used the whole bottle and it did nothing to help. It did do one thing...STINK! It's all nice and minty tea tree fresh and then it turns into a smell like old olive oil. Yuck. Was hoping for better. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Modeski

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! 1. My skin gets crazy itchy in the winter & no matter what body wash & lotions I use it doesn’t stop... until now! 2. I take immunosuppressant drugs for my autoimmune disease & this lead to me getting a fungal skin infection on my arms & legs and kept popping up... 2 weeks using this & it’s completely gone! Added bonuses: it smells great, it lathers well AND I use it to shave and I’m razor bump free! Can’t say enough wonderful things! I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shade

customer_reviews.title: They got the Remedy
customer_reviews.text: For me, I have some back acne and this product helped me eliminate any acne on my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: It took two months to get here.
customer_reviews.text: Since it took two months to get here I can't return it. Why would I want to return it? Some of the product was on the outside of the bottle. The bottle wasn't sealed to assure it hadn't been tampered with. The smell is very strong. I'm throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Oetting

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is wonderful for the summer! I love the natural ingredients and it leaves a nice tingle. Ladies, it's great for "that time of month". It leaves you feeling fresh and clean without the heavy perfumes in many feminine products. Just wash and rinse QUICKLY if you're using it for your lady parts, because it can get a little tingly!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Worsened my tinea
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why there are so many good reviews but this did not help my tinea at all. I have been using everyday and my tinea spread faster and now even itches when it has never before. Also it leaves a sticky type of feeling after cleaning off my skin. Do not recommend if you are trying to treat your tinea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: This smells super great and just has a super clean feel when I use it. I wish I could buy it by the gallon! I use it daily. I have a little toenail fungus, so my hope is that this will help manage that. Seems to be doing that so far. This is the 4th time I’ve purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Imboden

customer_reviews.title: Product received had no LABEL and caused my skin to itch
customer_reviews.text: No sure what I received because there was not label on the blue bottle that was delivered my home. (Red Flag #1) Also, when sampled the product, it made my skin itch, A LOT. Buyer be ware. I can't say what I might be allergic to because there was no label to list ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R Thomas

customer_reviews.title: For me it itches
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this for sensitive skin, and mine is definitely sensitive. This stuff definitely made my skin itch, couldn't get it washed off fast enough. Sorry, not good for me.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic _casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a larger girl and I have a couple of places where there are deep folds of skin that gets terribly, terribly irritated. This is very painful, it will get to the point where it cracks and bleeds. I've tried just about everything and nothing worked. No matter how clean this was kept the irritation would grow. This product, however, is a lifesaver! I'm so pleased to have found this because it really works! Having well water I also get terrible breakouts on top of my feet and around my lower legs but using this product it has began to recede. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making me feel like a new woman
customer_reviews.text: I am SO grateful that I found this product!! I suffer from Seborrheic dermatitis and have it on my face and ears. I also have issue with under boob sweat. First this product has clear up my Seborrheic dermatitis on my face and ears, Thank you!!! I have suffered for years with this condition and this product has been the only thing that's helped me. Second it has helped reduce my sweat smell!! I feel like a new woman Thank to this product!! I have shared with my friends and they are now going to give it a try!!! Thank you So much!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: No more toxic medications
customer_reviews.text: Oh. first ingredient is not WATER, but coconut oil. No water in this product. I was diagnosed with Tinea Versicolor and the dermatologist kept wanting me to put on a heavy expensive steroid ointment (very oily). I was recommended this by a naturalist and was tired of paying for the prescription that didn't seem to make it go away. After two weeks of using this, the Tinea Versicolor is gone. I am going to continue the use of this product for a month and see if it comes back. Not sure if it will be a forever use, or just when it comes back. Smells good, lathers good and is a great alternative for medications.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis Edward

customer_reviews.title: Best. Stuff. EVER!
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I have been suffering from itching wherever I sweat- my scalp, under breasts, a bit of toenail fungus ... In fact I think all those problems are fungal. When I read all the glowing reviews about Remedy Soap I felt it could give me the relief I need. Got it yesterday and SHAZAM! Blessed Relief! Only thing- I used it on the back of my itchy head and it stripped the oils from my longish hair! Lots of conditioner later I could comb out my hair! So worth it, though. The relief is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: wawa of Cali

customer_reviews.title: Actually works great!
customer_reviews.text: This truly is a great product. It actually works. I’m one of those unfortunate people who has great hygiene habits, however, my deodorant fails me within an hour of using. This product is obviously an excellent anti-bacterial product. My pits have remained fresh throughout the day. (I’m seriously not trying to be funny but I’m even laughing while I type this). So for you fellow people that get funky real quick during the day no matter what you do. Give this product a try. #nomorebo
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Dollar Day
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, hormones....age....I have been sweating like a whore on dollar day and smelling like a teenage boy at football practice in July - NASTY. Nothing was working, nothing. Showered several times a day, doubled up on deodorant, wore my husbands deodorant, light clothing, changed what I ate, drank more water, nothing helped. Bought this stuff and after a week of using this and a tea tree oil deodorant I no longer smell. What a relief, it was getting embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: LA Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just get this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried just about everything for my skin condition as well as excessive sweating. I just got this soap in the mail today and used it. Holy smokes, this is the answer I’ve been looking for. The scent is a light and minty. But most of all, my skin feels so clean and despite the weather being 84 degrees, my sweating is under control. Now as far as for rash I get on my torso, it’s less inflamed but I will update as I use this more. But I’m sold. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can burn eyes and even irritate skin a little. Is also too watery. But is an effective anti-fungal soap.
customer_reviews.author: Sivant

customer_reviews.title: Saved my laundry.
customer_reviews.text: My husband works out every day. That means lots of showers and lots of sweaty clothes. By using this soap when he showers (he loves it, says he feels he gets cleaner than any other body wash) his work out clothes are much easier to get those odors out in the laundry. With the new HE machines, those of us who cannot use fragrance in our laundry products have struggled to get odors out of our clothes. By using this product to wash he doesn't seem to produce the odors that are so difficult to get out of the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Root

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE PAINFUL, ITCHY RASHES and Very SOOTHING
customer_reviews.text: I was continually getting rashes especially during warmer spring and summer months in private areas that would sometimes turn into painful cysts even after using many practical steps to keep area very clean and dry from moisture from sweat. This Remedy Soap has helped tremendously and I have only had one rather small flare up this summer and was able to shut it down immediately by more frequent use. No more doctors visits, painful surgical removal of cysts not to mention the pain and embarrassment of it all. I am very thankful to have found this pdoduct.
customer_reviews.author: PrayinLizzie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and purchased a bottle of this soap because of a fungal infection rash I was getting on my back and lower stomach area. These rashes are reoccurring due to sweat and sun exposure.. at first the MD directed me to use Selsum Blue. It works, but I just wanted to see if I can get the same results, but w/ less chemicals. So I found this soap, tried it for about 2 weeks and I am pleased w/ the results. The rash has gone away (along w/ a topical cream the MD prescribed). So, now I know what to do should the rash resurface. I am very pleased w/ this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin feel like your mouth feels after brushing your teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soap! Hubby likes the tingling feeling. He gets Tinea Versicolor and after a few times of using it, I can already see a difference! He has tried miconazole cream and sprays, aloe, apple cider vinegar and many other "remedy's" all with varying degrees of success. The biggest problem with all of them is the time it takes to apply the remedy and since there is no "cure" it comes back no matter what. This soap is a super easy treatment that doesn't add a lot of time to your normal routine. I will up-date this review after he's used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap for Problem Skin
customer_reviews.text: Being made of tea tree oil, I was afraid it would have a very strong scent as most tea tree oil products do but I was pleasantly surprised that the scent is very mild. I have very sensitive skin and can develop a rash from contact with so many surfaces or chemicals. This soap started to work after just the first time using it. My skin is problem areas cleared up and it took care of itches as well. I've started using it as a full body wash when I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonder product. I needed an anti-fungal soap and after researching many products, chose this one. The price was much more reasonable, and with Prime , I got fast, free shipping. The smell is so very fresh and minty and it lathers up a cloud of bubbles. And best of all, it is working on the fungal issue. I recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have persistent yeast problems on my scalp and face. The shampoos and medicated creams from the doctor just won't get rid of it for very long and If you get the stuff in your eyes... ouch. This soap is not harsh... i use it twice daily on my face and it really clears up the problem. Scalp isn't itching and flaking like before.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Myers

customer_reviews.title: First Impression Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed using this is that as I washed and rinsed it left a very tacky feeling on my skin. I couldn't rinse the tackiness off no matter how long I stayed rinsing. Going through my day, that tacky feeling subsided a bit, but didn't leave me feeling very clean. Noticed it did not clean as well as other soaps I've used (left over sweat smell). Rather disappointed in my first use. By reading all other "critical" reviews, am wondering about quality / consistency control.
customer_reviews.author: D & J

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but might not be the end all.
customer_reviews.text: Idk how well this fully works. It does get rid of body odor. But I still itch pretty much the same in the groin areas. I recommend this mainly to remove odors. It might work for the other stuff, but just can't tell. Also not sure for how long. The bottle is smaller than the picture and different look all around. The bottle is a little hard to squeeze. And the solution inside is clear and doesn't build a lather amazingly. Now they do state why it doesn't and it's not that it doesn't lather, just not as foamy as some others. The smell is nice for the most part. But smells more medical afterwards in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scared v

customer_reviews.title: Skin calming wash
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help me deal with a life-long struggle with exercise induced fungus. Gross, I know. I have done everything including ointments, oral anti-fungals (which wreck the body, BTW) , and AC vinegar. I remove my work out gear immediately after exercise and wash in white vinegar and hot water. Anyway, I've tried lots of potential remedies. This wash is not a miracle, but it sure feels nice on my irritated skin. It is super emollient so you don't need much. I've been using for about a week, and my fungus is definitely less inflamed...I am using it in combination with another new ointment, and here's hoping it helps me get rid of these gross spots!
customer_reviews.author: lovlielovie

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've found my skin requires some type of tea tree anti-fungal body wash to keep itching at bay. Love this product. If I'm having an itching fit start I know I need to take a quick shower with this stuff and I have immediate relief. Before this product I was literally itching myself to bruising and making scratch marks everywhere. People would give my poor husband the side eye thinking something was happening in our home life and that made me more mad than anything. But after daily showering with this product I haven't had issues and it's made my quality of life go up. I've already purchased this product several times and will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rosburg

customer_reviews.title: Works well (I think) & smells good. Wish it was a bit stronger.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this, wish it lathered a bit more but I think it being a thicker gel soap probably sticks to your skin better in the shower and cleans it better. Who knows. I like this product, but I've tried 4 different/similar ones, and this one is my 2nd favorite. I don't think that most people would be disappointed with this product, so long as it cured their skin issue. Update: This is the 3rd time I've used Remedy Soap and I'm still satisfied. I am now 95 - 98% better. I'd buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewsAreLike...

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! I’m overweight and struggle with body odor when it’s hot. Nothing seemed to work. I gave this a try based on all the reviews and really wasn’t expecting too much. It started working on the first wash!! I showered at night and the next day was hot, but I didn’t smell AT ALL. I can’t say what a relief it is going into summer. Amazing. I immediately put it on subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: This Happy Homeschool

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Personally I love the smell off tea tree and peppermint! Not only does this soap smell great, but it really helps me kill Bacteria. I work at a gym/yoga studio so I deal with sweaty people all day,along side with touching door handles and equipment. This stuff is perfect for after jujitsu or kick boxing. Not only does this soap help me avoid things like ring worm it doesn't dry out or leave my skin sticky. I keep buying this stuff because it works!
customer_reviews.author: Qx6

customer_reviews.title: I see a visible difference
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my athlete's foot. I only used it for two days now and visibly see a difference on my feet already. My ugly heels are not dry anymore! It seems this soap moisturize the skin very well, which I didn't expect at all. I've used a popular tea tree foot soak almost a year but my feet were always dry and ugly. So this product already exceeds my expectation. I want to see if this soap works on athlete's foot though I know it'll takes patience. I hope I can update on athlete's foot soon.
customer_reviews.author: c_y_k

customer_reviews.title: Nomore Odor!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very strong Odor with my sweat. This Product kept me smelling pleasant throughout the entire day, sweat and all. Strong minty smell while lathering up but no smell after the shower was over (Which didn't bother me because no smell is better than smelling sweaty). The only concern with this product was the sensitivity it had on My Private (Outside contact only), while the soap was present, no other area on my body was sensitive to the product. The slight burning sensation went away shortly after rinsing off and didn't bother me at all afterwards. I would highly recommend this product for someone with strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Monea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lather very well. Has a pleasing scent.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how well this product works, as I haven’t noticed a difference. I have very sensitive skin and the product didn’t seem to aggravate my skin like others have done. I’m not happy with how well this stays lathered. It seems that I would lather up, and by the time I used the loofah to wash both legs and arms, the bubbles were gone. I even have a great water softener, which means that the bubbles should have lingered longer, but they didn’t. I’m staying neutral on whether to recommend this product or not. You may need to just try it out for yourself to see if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: CrocodileEMT

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a residue on skin.
customer_reviews.text: This soap leaves a weird film on your body that makes you feel squeaky/rubbery. I unfortunately used this in a bath so the residue of the soap got in my hair giving it a really weird waxy texture. I do not reccomend this product for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny

customer_reviews.title: Helped me with wound care
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this soap smell nice, I saw an improvement in a slow-healing wound in my leg after switching to Remedy. I just used it on my leg in the shower like normal soap. I am not a doctor or other health care specialist, and my experience is only one piece of data. However, I plan on keeping some Remedy soap in the house from now on.
customer_reviews.author: CWC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I tried this last night in the shower. It’s so refreshing. I loved the scent. Now I can’t use deodorant because of allergies but it kept me fresh all night. Loved it. Purchased the second bottle: as you know teenagers are big BO scents. This works great for my teenager no lingering bad scents. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Winter_74

customer_reviews.title: Sour feet to sweet feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! My feet used to be so stinky after I got home from work and even after I washed them with regular soap, the smell wouldn't go away until I used this product. It also helps that I bought this cool foot scrubber that makes sure that the soap gets to every area. The only thing that I wish could change about the soap is the smell. I wish there were more scents but other than that, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Henson

customer_reviews.title: Relieved 6-years of Crazy Leg Itchiness and Bumps!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product. For about 6 years, both of my shins have broken out with bumps that are itchy, especially at night. I visited the dermatologist and tried prescriptions for contact dermatitis, changed detergent to free/clear ALL, changed soaps... only used Dove bar soap or body wash, used Eucerin skin products for eczema, tried "African black soaps", shea soaps, oatmeal soaps... This is THE ONLY PRODUCT that has relieved my symptoms for the first time in 6 years. The ONLY reason that it doesn't get 4 stars is because, like most tea tree oil products, there is a weird "gasoline-smell". Although, this one is WAY better than Bronner's magic tea tree soap. That smells like pure gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: RedBrickMama

customer_reviews.title: will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! I have extremely sensitive skin so I'm always hesitant to buy new products, luckily this product did not break my skin out in an allergic reaction. My chest always breaks out in the summer and if I don't shower immediately after a workout (I have hyperhidrosis) and I had never thought of looking into a product like this to help. I'm so thankful I came across this product because it cleared up my chest in a few days. I am so happy with how well it worked and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who suffer with stress sweat
customer_reviews.text: In my line of work, I normally suffer from stress sweat and end up enduring foul smell. I get very self-conscious, so I decided to purchase this and honestly, glad I did! With the combination of switching to CBD natural deodorant and using this body wash, foul smell has become minimal. Thus my self-esteem was raised a notch.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good soap.
customer_reviews.text: The soap was what I was expecting it to be and does what it is supposed to do - cleanse and soothe my skin. It is not as sudsy as traditional liquid soaps but it still lathers up well enough to thoroughly wash my skin. It has a pleasant odor and I feel refreshed when I get out of the shower. I have only one minor complaint and that is the bottle is hard to squeeze. At some point I intend on transferring the contents to a softer sided squeeze bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and really refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and really refreshing. I had some good issues and this, along with some other footcare, cleared everything up.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Tingly! Scent does not last a full shower.
customer_reviews.text: I love a nice tea-tree oil body wash. For many years I used to Trader Joe's Tea Tree Tingle. However, in an effort to avoid going to stores if I can help it, I decided to order this. The scent starts out pleasant, a mixture of tea tree oil and mint smells. Unfortunately, I feel like half way through my shower, the scent seems to have faded and there is just a generic soapy smell. It might be the natural ingredients, but I'm not sure. I might order it again in a pinch, but I think I'll probably go back to TJ's stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Grant

customer_reviews.title: It works right away- smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing. I noticed an improvement with my first use. And with each wash it keeps getting better and better. I overall have never really dealt with much acne but recently have some body acne (upper back thighs and lower part of booty). It’s gotten worse when I have to sit for long periods of time. Anyway, my skin is smooth and soft and way more clear- in under a week! I’ve recently started to use a tea tree lotion too, hoping it will kick everything out.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: So I noticed my bottle doesn’t say anything about anti-fungal, bacteria or anything of the sort. I had an irritation which I thought was fungus from a nail shop on my finger. It was almost gone using lotrium but now that I’ve been using this it’s returned and my finger is itchier than normal. I still gave it four stars bc I feel clean afterwards and my tweens smells have calmed down a lot with only using it one week. Just not sure if I received the wrong bottle or it just doesn’t work for one little spot of fungus
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda.O

customer_reviews.title: This soap helps facial problems!
customer_reviews.text: I had a persistent yeast infection on my face. Remedy soap aided me in getting rid of the infection. I’ll keep using this soap because it is mild and cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Sankowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Best soap ever , I have a real problem with dry skin in the winter this stuff is amazing no more dry skin , so clean feeling and I love the scent definitely recommend this !!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Richardson

customer_reviews.title: My face is finally clear (almost)
customer_reviews.text: I was having some issues where I was having dry, scaly patches on my nose, around my mouth, under my eyes, and on my chin. I had tried at least half a dozen remedies and this product was my last effort before going to the doctor. My face started clearing up immediately after using it and once I lathered a bit on my face and let it sit while I washed the rest of my body, my face is nearly completely cleared up! I have used it every night for about a month and a half and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Becca R

customer_reviews.title: Product really works well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural product to help me with a problem within 1 week the problem is almost gone. I use on the problem area when I shower, every day, this product has a nice scent. This product works so well I purchased 2 more bottles. Definitely recommend this product. Important Update: I first purchased on Jan 9 2019 and have used it since and I have to say this works great I no longer have any problems with a rash I use this e very morning in the shower I let it sit for a few minutes then rinse it off and the problem was resolved. I will continue to use it as a preventive measure.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great smell & controls odor
customer_reviews.text: The best part so far is the smell of the product while washing and the smell of ME for a lengthy time after. It’s summer, and we all sweat. The antibacterial properties of this soap work so much better than other soaps. Let it soak on your skin for a little while in sweaty areas! I can definitely tell a difference. Although, I have a very small area of athletes foot on a toe and so far it hasn’t cleared up from the product. It might not work for everyone for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but better alternatives are available
customer_reviews.text: The soap is fine and has a nice peppermint scent. Although I don’t see any benefit over other tree tea soaps such as Jason or Trader Joe’s. This is a lot more expensive for less product and the packaging is poor. There is no pump. The spout in the lid gets easily clogged, so you have to unscrew the lid and pour it out during a shower, which is inconvenient and wastes product. It was worth a try but I will not refill the order. I also bought the Jason Tea Tree body wash, which comes in a pump bottle and has about twice as much product for $5 less.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice liquid soap
customer_reviews.text: I read the product description and thought, wow, this soap will cure and clean everything. However, I bought it for the popular ingredients: tree tea oil, eucalyptus, peppermint, and aloe vera. I know those will smell nice and can't hurt the body on the outside. And I like the smell of eucalyptus in particular. I don't know if using this soap is "curing" anything, but it smells good and seems to wash away dirt and odors. I like it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hrothgar

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing, I use it for regular wash but I also bring it when out in the woods/camping. My child walked through poison ivy while camping, we didn’t know until he started really itching everywhere. We gave him a shower and used this soap, made sure he washed everywhere well and just like that the itching stopped and he was ok, never got a blister or anything. He’s also a ginger with very sensitive skin, this is my go to soap.
customer_reviews.author: Panda bear

customer_reviews.title: smells great, not too strong
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap a lot. However it's formulated ensures your skin is not being over sensitized by the tea tree and mint, which is great. After a few uses, I broke out in hives on my arms. That's not completely abnormal for my sensitive skin, and it went away within about a day, but this wash was the only new thing in my routine. Despite that, I haven't had any more issues and this soap has even been helping with my acne as a once per week face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I put 1 star for moisturising, but it's not, like at all. Leaves you with that Irish Spring squeaky squeaky feel, HOWEVER it states to follow up with some lotion if needed. I used this cause I broke out with PITYRIASIS ROSEA and this honestly saved my skin and spead up my recovery time. I washed with it daily and followed up with a gentle unscented lotion. What could of taken up to 12 weeks, cleared in about 3 weeks. I recommed to anyone. Also see myself using on occasion in normal beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bodywash. I belive the antifungal properties absolutely work. Ladies be careful of getting this peppermint infused wash in your private area. You'll get more than you bargained for. But you'll be just fine as long as you make your lady parts a no soap zone. Smells great. Works great. My only complaint is that I feel like I'm going to run out much sooner than I run out of my normal body wash. You don't get as much for your dollar as regular store bodywash but if you are using it for skin purposes then it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Novelist In Training

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of other reviews for different body soaps. This one stands out due to it said it helps with Odor and back acne. So I get the occasional acne on my back/shoulders/chest area. I’ve tried so many different products but nothing works. So I tried this and it’s ok I haven’t broken out as much. Only thing I don’t like is that it leaves your skin dry after using it. Not sure if its because it’s a topical item. But I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Bottle does not say anti-fungal
customer_reviews.text: This bottle says nothing about anti-fungal like the description and pictures. Is this the same?
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Had a fungal infection from mold and this product got it cleared up skin back to normal
customer_reviews.text: Washed my mattress with water and bleach after a child peed in my bed. The water created mold in my mattress that I laid on without knowing the mold was there. The mold caused a fungal infection on my skin that was spreading. Doctors prescribed antibiotics but they were working slowly. The area didn't clear up until I started using this product. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bye Smell
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this product. I works to take away any odor that other soaps may leave behind. I'm a heavier set girl and would have a sweaty smell in between my privates and thighs that would not seem to go away no matter how long I scrubbed. But with only one wash of this soap it was completely gone. I will definitely buy again for myself and my growing preteen
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Remedy Soap Tea Tree Oil Body Wash is a fantastic product! I have dry, itchy skin this winter and needed something to calm my skin. I had tried several products that just didn't deliver for me. When a friend suggested Remedy, I was skeptical, but quickly found it works well for me. The tea tree oil/eucalyptus scent is a little strong while in use, but it rinses clean and the scent does not linger. If using as a body wash, be aware tingles a bit on more sensitive areas, so use with care in "those" areas if you have sensitive skin. It lathers well and although a little pricier than some body washes, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It actually works, so worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS SOAP WORKS!!! I am a plus-sized woman and have dealt with yeast rashes in the inside thigh areas where leg meets tummy and under the breasts for about 10 years now. This deals with both the smell and the rash itself. It is cooling and soothing on contact, there is zero foul smell for 24 hours after cleaning the affected areas. ZERO. The product smells quite minty but in a pleasant way (thought I might smell like a walking peppermint but my husband didn't think so). I will continue to buy this product as long as it keeps working!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it actually works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: No joke, this soap works. I work out extensively and this soap makes me smell lilly fresh all day long. From head to tail, this is the best soap I have found that actually works. The Tea Tree Oil component is key. I even put a little dab in my hair for a final rinse after shampooing with regular shampoo. It's not the least expensive body soap, but it works. That's the bottom line.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: Was not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bc it was a lightening sale price and had good reviews. It was nothing special. I’ve been happier with items that have cost 1/4 of this sale price, smelled better and came in a higher volume bottle. I wasn’t unhappy with this purchase, but it was truly nothing special. My grandson also used it for his stinky feet. His feet still stink. I added oils to store bought lotion and been happier and gotten better results for his feet than w this product. It’s just nothing special. I would use it if it were free, but I certainly would not pay anything over a regular body wash price for this product again.
customer_reviews.author: suzi logsdon

customer_reviews.title: Frustratingly Un-helpful—caused more problems than solved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on amazon’s recommendation, the generally positive reviews and it’s claim that it was great for sensitive skin. Unfortunately, it’s been a major disappointment. It has a great smell and the moisturizing oils feel awesome while showering, but once the warmth of the shower was done those same oils then clogged my pores—so this body wash actually caused me to breakout and made my body odor worse after less than an hour out the shower. So I gave it three days worth of use, even lathering and rinsing twice (and three times for arm pits, pelvis, feet) but it’s only getting worse. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Young

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have struggled with athletes feet for years. Tried tinactin, lotrimin, sprays, creams, off brand products, prescription creams, tea trea oil + other oils, vinegar soaks and nothing compares to this. I've only had the product for 3 days and I can already see a drastic improvement and I only use it once a day! I have sensitive skin and this definitley works for me. It is not moisturizing, though. It dries my feet out quite a bit, but it's killing the fungus, so I'm okay with that! Definitley recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keriene Lucas

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Today was the first time I used it and I was surprised how a quarter size was more then enough for my body, and it lathered up wonderfully. The scent was nice, and I felt a mild tingle. As I run my hand all over myself, I am noticing my skin is very soft, not dry.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Micotto

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a fungal infection and staph at the same time. He was miserable. This, along with antibiotics, healed him right up.
customer_reviews.author: TERRI Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin & some scaly spots, this stuff works really well. It helps reduce dryness & itchy inflammation and it smells really refreshing. However, because of the peppermint oils in it.... avoid using it on the tender bits as may it be irritating there.
customer_reviews.author: tkdtko

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and psoriasis and this body wash works for both. The itching stops almost immediately on contact of skin. I would recommend this soap over and over again. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaron brimmage

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN and FRESH like never before
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress enough how CLEAN and FRESH I felt after I used it for the first time. I had tried several commercial brands, liquid and bar soaps, none worked as efficiently as this one. The essence is minty, and it has an "aroma-therapeutic" effect that can be felt on the skin, it kind of relaxes you. Regarding the anti-fungal properties, I have only used it a couple times and I will have to update this review in a later time. Note: I did notice that my body has not sweat as much as it used to since I started using this soap, and I am heavy set and sweat a lot (used to anyway)
customer_reviews.author: Jonnatan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t do any of the things it said it would. Smells like peppermint but slightly medicinal. Not very moisturizering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great and really helps with athlete's foot - heck
customer_reviews.text: This and other products are the reason I buy Amazon. I get winning hits and I have only returned in all the years a couple of items. This stuff is great and really helps with athlete's foot - heck, I like it so much, I use it as a body wash. I totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Signlaw

customer_reviews.title: Works well😍
customer_reviews.text: We really needed this for our climate and activity level this season. Wonderfully working for eczema, athlete's foot, and body acne.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Papazian

customer_reviews.title: But it! It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wash. I was having issues in my groin area with yeast infections. No ointment or powder could keep it at bay. Started using this wash on my groin, under my breasts, and along my c-section scar; no more issues! The smell is invigorating. No irritation to my extremely sensitive skin. I’ve suggested it to many people. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have a problem with bumps on my booty. Even though no one sees my booty besides my husband, I still feel self conscience about it. So googling brought me to this. I don't know if it's my desk job that further causes my bumpy booty problem because I feel like I've had this problem ever since puberty. BUT this soap seems to be helping A LOT. I've noticed the bumps are slowly disappearing. I'm not sure if anyone else has mentioned this in a review but my butt crack get kind of a minty feeling XD It's a great product, I plan on buying more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Feels very clean after use.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I loved this product. I actually bought it because our guinea pig got diagnosed with ring worm and I just wanted to protect myself and kids from getting it too. The whole family washed with it every night. No one got ring worm, but I took a lot of other precautions besides anti fungal body wash. The smell is light and naturally fresh. Skin felt really clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Anti fungal soap
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. I love it. Lathers so good. Do wish had a better smell but that is just the original smell of the ingredients so it isn't bad just what it is supposed to be. Wish the price for the size of the bottle was a little cheaper. Wish it was a little stronger, so I would FEEL it working more. I can feel it working in the folds and such a little like a burn sensation that is how I describe it anyway. Wish just a little more. All in all so far so good with it and I like it
customer_reviews.author: tabby

product_meta.title: Remedy Soap Tea Tree Oil Body Wash, Helps Body Odor, Athlete’s Foot, Jock Itch, Ringworm, Yeast Infections, Skin Irritations, Shower Gel for Women/Men, Natural Mint & Aloe Skin Cleanser 12 Oz
feature_bullets: ★ REMEDY TEA TREE OIL BODY WASH SOAP New Large 12 oz Size is Made In USA. Our Remedy Foot & Body Wash is a Foot and Body Odor eliminator that soothes Athlete's Foot, Toe Nails, Candida, Ringworm, Jock Itch, Acne and other Skin Irritations. Our Tea Tree Shower Gel with peppermint SMELLS GREAT, is balanced for all skin types and gives you a fresh tingling sensation.

★ ORGANIC & NATURAL BODY WASH INGREDIENTS – Our men & women shower gel is made from Premium Botanical Tea Tree Oils, Eucalyptus Oils and Peppermint Oils which are well known for helping skin irritations. We added JOJOBA, COCONUT and OLIVE oil to moisturize, refresh & deodorize itchy smelly feet. Our foot wash & body soap has NO Preservatives, Petroleum, Sulfate, Silicone, Synthetic Fragrance or Dyes oft Found in Gels, Lotions, Creams and Ointments.

★ GREAT FOR ACTIVE PEOPLE – Remedy shower gel is great for Athletes who are active in soccer, basketball, CrossFit, martial arts, running, cycling, yoga, Pilates, MMA (mixed martial arts), boxing, football, or workout regularly at the gym. Our man and woman body wash is gentle enough to be used daily. Throw a bottle of our shower gel for women and men into your gym bag and use it regularly. Strong Enough for the Gym - Gentle Enough to Use Every Day!

★ SOOTHES DRY, ITCHY, CRACKED, FLAKY, SKIN: Our Premium Body Soap Liquid Solution Contains Skin Enriching Omega 3,6,7,& 9, Vitamin E & C, Aloe Vera, Tea Tree Oil, Eucalyptus Oil and other essential oils which Helps Soothe, Foot and Body, Skin Irritations on your Face, Hands, Heels, Toenails, Elbow, Back, Chest, and Butt. Men and women with acne and eczema use our moisturizing body wash for cleaner feeling skin.

★TRUREMEDY NATURALS PROMISE: We Stand By all Our Products – Remedy Soap Bars, Remedy Soap for men and women shower gel, Remedy Balm, Remedy Bruise Cream, Natural Mint Foot & Shoe Deodorizer, and Tea Tree Oil Foot Soak with Epsom Salt. If you have any issues with our organic body wash reach out to us and we will do our best to make it right.
